page.title: 10PARWICH HILL RACE
page.content: This takes place every year during Parwich Wakes Week. We started by lining up at the start near The Sycamore Inn. Then off we went past Sycamore Cottages and past West View Cottages. There are arrows all round the course showing you where to go. We went past Anna's house and through a stile into a field which leads to Parwich Hill. It is very steep. At the top of the hill was Tom's dad and he gave us a drink of water. You have to go to the very top or else you will be disqualified. Then we went back down through a gate near Parwich Hall, past the shop and back to the pub. Matthew Webster won the race. He was very pleased as he had been trying for many years. All kinds of people take part including men, ladies and children.
